amendment.description: To amend the provisions dealing with security measures for general aviation and air charters.

vote.text: Amendment SA 894 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 894 proposed by Senator Inhofe. (consideration: CR S7801-7802; text: CR S7801-7802) To amend the provisions dealing with security measures for general aviation and air charters.
